text: Kicking off my Top 15 of 2019 with a classic with a twist. While Tetis Effect became my go-to version last year, it only took a year with Tetris 99's release for it to become my new #1 Tetris thanks to its addicting online multiplayer. Sure, it doesn't always feel fair when you're suddenly randomly targetted by 5+ players and you go to from a clean board to a catastrophy in a matter of seconds, but the adrenaline rush is amazing. Reaching the top 10 is hard enough, but with the music kicking in you start getting in a zone that feels perfect. I really like the additions of various boards because I was definitely getting tired of the same theme playing all the time. This School feel-good theme is a favorite of mine.
author: SupraDarky

text:
i personally still use the default one, there is just something special about it xD

author: Aurelien Balmas

text: This is probably the only battle royale I've been fully invested in and honestly it's the only one that's been worth that investment. What a great game.
author: Dalton McBleh

text: Battle royale Tetris is a thing that I didn’t know I wanted, but I’m so glad I have it. It’s worth the Nintendo Online subscription alone.
author: David E.

text:
Tetris 99 has seriously helped my Tetris skills immensely. Previously, my skills were horrible. I entered an Iron Gamer tournament, and one round was Tetris. I was dead last, including children, as I could only manage about 4 lines. I was legendarily bad. The kind of bad where you knock yourself out before anyone has a chance to get you.
Now with Tetris 99 I've gotten as high as 14th before! It makes me really happy, and games usually only take about 2-3 minutes which is relaxing and fun.
author: Arc13

text:
Hello SupraDarky, I really like what you're doing with this list!
I discovered your channel some time ago and I just managed to catch up all of your uploads ^^
In fact, you inspired me to create my own list :D
I already picked a good amount of tracks i would like to share, but i was wondering if I should just create a Playlist and add uploads from other sources, or make my own uploads, just like you.
Have you any advice about that ?
Thank you and have a great day!
